Package com.flipkart.utils

Class FlipFitMySQL

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.utils.FlipFitMySQL
public class FlipFitMySQL extends Object
Utility class for managing MySQL database connections and operations.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public <T> T execute(FlipFitMySQL.ConnectionHandler<T> executor)
      Executes a database operation defined by the ConnectionHandler callback.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of result returned by the operation.
      Parameters:
      executor - The callback that defines the database operation to be performed.
      Returns:
      The result of the database operation, or null if an exception occurs.
